mapper.select:
SELECT q_no, q_lock, q_title, q_content, q_answer, q_date, m_no, m_name as q_name FROM qna natural join members
q_title like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
q_title like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or q_content like '%' ||#{searchWord} || '%'
m_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
ORDER BY q_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna VALUES ( qna_seq.nextval, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, #{q_lock}, #{q_answer}, sysdate, #{m_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT q_no, q_lock, q_title, q_content, q_answer, q_date, m_no FROM qna WHERE q_no=#{q_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET q_title=#{q_title}, q_content=#{q_content}, q_lock=#{q_lock} WHERE q_no=#{q_no} and m_no=#{m_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qna WHERE q_no=#{q_no} and m_no=#{m_no}
